summary: Successfully tested and FIXED Supabase integration for player profiles. Real player data now loads correctly instead of mock data. Fixed critical bug in snapshot selection logic.

flaky_endpoints.workaround: Player profile main data works, only history endpoint fails

integration_issues.issue: Navigation crashes with connection refused error

passed_tests: ✅ Player profile for 'andrew' (#UU9GJ9QQ) shows REAL name instead of 'Player UU9G'
✅ Player profile for 'Mateи238' (#LP920YJC) shows REAL data
✅ Player profile for 'War.Frog' (#UL0LRJ02) shows REAL data
✅ [RCA] diagnostic logs show SUCCESS messages instead of FAILURE POINT
✅ Real hero levels, town hall data, and trophies displayed
✅ Real clan name '...HeCk YeAh...' displayed instead of mock data
✅ Page metadata shows real player names in titles and descriptions
✅ Multiple players tested - consistent real data loading
✅ No 'Maximum update depth exceeded' errors detected
action_item_for_main_agent: MAJOR SUCCESS: Player profile bug is FIXED! Real data now loads correctly. Minor remaining issues: 1) Fix /api/player/*/history endpoint (500 error), 2) Fix browser back navigation crash. The core functionality is working perfectly.
